raft.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: a flat floating structure, usually made of pieces of wood tied together, used as a boat
raft.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: a flat floating structure that you can sit on, jump from etc when you are swimming
raft.translation[0].definitions[2].defin: a small flat rubber boat filled with air, used for example if a boat sinks
raft.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: There has been a raft of new laws aimed at giving better protection to children in the past few years.
